author: wn.com
title: 'McDonald's Diet' Guy Now Giving Lectures At U.S. Schools, On McDonald's Dime
text: LOS ANGELES, Oct 14 (Reuters) - Former Iowa science teacher John Cisna, who says he lost 60 pounds on a six-month regimen of McDonald's food and daily walks, has sparked outrage among public health advocates for taking his story to U.S.
